name: 'The New Andy Griffith Show' Quiz | Television | 5 Questions

questions.text: In 1970 Andy starred in a shortlived show called 'Headmaster'.
questions.explanation:
true.

	Andy played Andy Thompson, the dean of Concord High School. It was not successful.

questions.text: CBS brought 'The New Andy Griffith Show' to TV in 1971. In what fictional town was it located in?
questions.explanation:
Greenwood, North Carolina.

	Greenwood was bigger than Mayberry but lacked Mayberry's charm.

questions.text: What was the name of the character Andy played in this new show?
Andy played a 'hometown boy' who returned and became the town's ______. What goes in the blank?
questions.explanation:
Mayor.

	The show began with decent ratings but quickly declined and did not complete the season. It ran from January to May in 1971 and was cancelled

questions.text: Who played Andy's wife in this show?
options: He was a widower in this show as well
questions.explanation:
Lee Meriweather.

	Meriweather went on to star in 'Time Tunnel' and 'Barnaby Jones'
